fields.name: Passives:
fields.value: - Entrancing: If you are alone in a Room with another player, you may choose to completely nullify any non-self playing card plays they make. Their plays will appear to be Trapped. (ignores (Reforged) cards)

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Hypnotize: Pick a player. Pick which Room they will enter tonight. Cannot be their home. [2 uses, 2 CD, Day-Only]
- Control: Pick a player. See their entire Hand with modifiers. Play up to 2 cards for them. [1 use, Unique]
- Befuddle: Pick a player. All cards that they play in the next phase that has a non-self target will instead target a random different target. (ignores (Reforged) cards) [2 uses, 4 CD, Unique]
- Dement: Choose a card a player will draw this phase. It will appear normal, but when played the target will gain a 1 phase of a random negative status instantly (that is not Intoxicated). [Infinite uses, 2 CD, Astral]
